Name: Force specific screen saver: Screen saver executable name

Category: Administrative Templates: Start Menu and Taskbar
Name: Notifications: Turn off toast notifications on the lock screen
Internet Communication Management: Internet Communication Settings: Turn off Help Experience Improvement Program
Attachment Manager: Do not preserve zone information in file attachments
Attachment Manager: Notify antivirus programs when opening attachments
Cloud Content: Configure Windows spotlight on lock screen
Cloud Content: Do not suggest third-party content in Windows spotlight
Cloud Content: Do not use diagnostic data for tailored experiences
Cloud Content: Turn off all Windows spotlight features
Network Sharing: Prevent users from sharing files within their profile
Windows Installer: Always install with elevated privileges
